org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SimpleStorageElement

All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageElement
public class LruStorageElement
extends AccessHistoryStorageElement

This StorageElement deletes the file stored on it that was accessed least recently.

Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

LruStorageElement

public LruStorageElement(GridSite site,
                         long capacity)
Parameters:
site - The GridSite on which the SE is situated.
capacity - The total capacity of this SE.
Method Detail

filesToDelete

public java.util.List filesToDelete(DataFile newFile)
Returns the DataFiles that were accessed least recently in the access history. If there are files on the SE not in the access history these are preferentially used since they have the most recent access older than any in the access history.

Specified by:
filesToDelete in interface StorageElement
Overrides:
filesToDelete in class SimpleStorageElement
Returns:
A List of least recently accessed DataFiles on the SE.
